class.name: TileData
class.brief_description: Settings for a single tile in a [TileSet].
class.description: [TileData] object represents a single tile in a [TileSet]. It is usually edited using the tileset editor, but it can be modified at runtime using [method TileMap._tile_data_runtime_update].

method.name: add_collision_polygon
method.description: Adds a collision polygon to the tile on the given TileSet physics layer.

method.name: add_occluder_polygon
method.description: Adds an occlusion polygon to the tile on the TileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_collision_polygon_one_way_margin
method.description: Returns the one-way margin (for one-way platforms) of the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for TileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_collision_polygon_points
method.description: Returns the points of the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for TileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_collision_polygons_count
method.description: Returns how many polygons the tile has for TileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Returns the constant angular velocity applied to objects colliding with this tile.

method.name: get_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Returns the constant linear velocity applied to objects colliding with this tile.

method.name: get_custom_data
method.description: Returns the custom data value for custom data layer named [param layer_name]. To check if a custom data layer exists, use [method has_custom_data].

method.name: get_custom_data_by_layer_id
method.description: Returns the custom data value for custom data layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_navigation_polygon
method.description: Returns the navigation polygon of the tile for the TileSet navigation layer with index [param layer_id]. [param flip_h], [param flip_v], and [param transpose] allow transforming the returned polygon.

method.name: get_occluder
method.description: Returns the occluder polygon of the tile for the TileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id]. [param flip_h], [param flip_v], and [param transpose] allow transforming the returned polygon.

method.name: get_occluder_polygon
method.description: Returns the occluder polygon at index [param polygon_index] from the TileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id]. The [param flip_h], [param flip_v], and [param transpose] parameters can be [code]true[/code] to transform the returned polygon.

method.name: get_occluder_polygons_count
method.description: Returns the number of occluder polygons of the tile in the TileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_terrain_peering_bit
method.description: Returns the tile's terrain bit for the given [param peering_bit] direction. To check that a direction is valid, use [method is_valid_terrain_peering_bit].

method.name: has_custom_data
method.description: Returns whether there exists a custom data layer named [param layer_name].

method.name: is_collision_polygon_one_way
method.description: Returns whether one-way collisions are enabled for the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for TileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: is_valid_terrain_peering_bit
method.description: Returns whether the given [param peering_bit] direction is valid for this tile.

method.name: remove_collision_polygon
method.description: Removes the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for TileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: remove_occluder_polygon
method.description: Removes the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for TileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_collision_polygon_one_way
method.description: Enables/disables one-way collisions on the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for TileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_collision_polygon_one_way_margin
method.description: Sets the one-way margin (for one-way platforms) of the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for TileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_collision_polygon_points
method.description: Sets the points of the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for TileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_collision_polygons_count
method.description: Sets the polygons count for TileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Sets the constant angular velocity. This does not rotate the tile. This angular velocity is applied to objects colliding with this tile.

method.name: set_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Sets the constant linear velocity. This does not move the tile. This linear velocity is applied to objects colliding with this tile. This is useful to create conveyor belts.

method.name: set_custom_data
method.description: Sets the tile's custom data value for the TileSet custom data layer with name [param layer_name].

method.name: set_custom_data_by_layer_id
method.description: Sets the tile's custom data value for the TileSet custom data layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_navigation_polygon
method.description: Sets the navigation polygon for the TileSet navigation layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_occluder
method.description: Sets the occluder for the TileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_occluder_polygon
method.description: Sets the occluder for polygon with index [param polygon_index] in the TileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_occluder_polygons_count
method.description: Sets the occluder polygon count in the TileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_terrain_peering_bit
method.description: Sets the tile's terrain bit for the given [param peering_bit] direction. To check that a direction is valid, use [method is_valid_terrain_peering_bit].

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the tile will have its texture flipped horizontally.
If [code]true[/code], the tile will have its texture flipped vertically.
The [Material] to use for this [TileData]. This can be a [CanvasItemMaterial] to use the default shader, or a [ShaderMaterial] to use a custom shader.
Relative probability of this tile being selected when drawing a pattern of random tiles.
ID of the terrain from the terrain set that the tile uses.
ID of the terrain set that the tile uses.
Offsets the position of where the tile is drawn.
If [code]true[/code], the tile will display transposed, i.e. with horizontal and vertical texture UVs swapped.
Vertical point of the tile used for determining y-sorted order.
Ordering index of this tile, relative to [TileMap].

signal.name: changed
signal.description: Emitted when any of the properties are changed.
